name: system-setup
notes:
# System Setups

### RPi Zero

#### Setup SSH from USB
1) place line in ```/config.txt``` at the very bottom
```
dtoverlay=dwc2
```

2) place line after ```rootwait``` in ```/cmdline.txt```
      * space deliminated as kernel params
```
modules-load=dwc2,g_ether
```

3) enabled ssh by adding .ssh in the ```/boot``` directory

4) ```ssh pi@raspberrypi.local``` should now work
